Openflows

System Methods Currency

MiroFish

Type: current

Signal

MiroFish proposes a memory-oriented operating layer for AI-era work, centered on persistent context across sessions.

Context

The emphasis shifts from one-off model responses toward continuity: what can be captured, organized, and re-entered in future cycles.

Relevance

For Openflows, continuity is a structural condition for compounding cognition. A memory OS pattern suggests local intelligence that can be iterated, inspected, and revised over time.

Current State

Emergent infrastructure pattern with active exploration.

Open Questions

  • How should personal knowledge boundaries be encoded and audited?
  • What primitives are needed for portable, local-first memory continuity?
  • How can memory systems avoid silent accumulation of low-quality context?

Connections

  • Linked to local-inference-baseline as a dependency condition.
  • Linked to bettafish as a parallel memory-layer exploration.

Connections

  • Local Inference as Baseline - builds on the environment described in (circuit)
  • BettaFish - runs in parallel with (current)
